doc_id: ministry_it::it_cert::How to apply for an IT certificate?
title: How to apply for an IT certificate?
content: Ministry of IT & Digital Affairs | IT Certificates | How to apply for an IT certificate? | Fill online form and upload NIC.

metadata.instructions: Visit the digital portal, register and submit application.

doc_id: ministry_education::schools::How to register a school?
title: How to register a school?
content: Ministry of Education | Schools | How to register a school? | Complete registration form and submit documents.

metadata.instructions: Follow the guidelines on the education portal.

doc_id: ministry_education::exams::How to apply for national exam?
title: How to apply for national exam?
content: Ministry of Education | Exams & Results | How to apply for national exam? | Register via examination portal.

doc_id: ministry_education::exams::Where can I download exam results?
title: Where can I download exam results?
content: Ministry of Education | Exams & Results | Where can I download exam results? | Visit doenets.lk for official exam results.

metadata.instructions: Enter your index number to view results.

doc_id: ministry_health::health_general::How to get a medical certificate?
title: How to get a medical certificate?
content: Ministry of Health | General Health Services | How to get a medical certificate? | Visit nearest government hospital with NIC.

metadata.instructions: Bring NIC and previous medical records if any.

doc_id: ministry_transport::driving_license::How to apply for a driving license?
title: How to apply for a driving license?
content: Ministry of Transport | Driving License | How to apply for a driving license? | Complete application form at DMT office.

metadata.instructions: Bring NIC, medical certificate, and passport photos.

doc_id: ministry_imm::passport::How to apply for a passport?
title: How to apply for a passport?
content: Ministry of Immigration | Passport Services | How to apply for a passport? | Apply online and visit immigration office for biometrics.

metadata.instructions: Bring birth certificate, NIC, and proof of address.

doc_id: ministry_imm::passport::What is the process for passport renewal?
title: What is the process for passport renewal?
content: Ministry of Immigration | Passport Services | What is the process for passport renewal? | Apply online at immigration.gov.lk, submit old passport and new photos.

doc_id: ministry_foreign::visa::How to get a visa for travel?
title: How to get a visa for travel?
content: Ministry of Foreign Affairs | Visa Services | How to get a visa for travel? | Apply through embassy website of destination country.

doc_id: ministry_finance::tax::How to file income tax?
title: How to file income tax?
content: Ministry of Finance | Tax Services | How to file income tax? | Register on Inland Revenue portal and submit returns online.

doc_id: ministry_labour::employment::How to register for job placement?
title: How to register for job placement?
content: Ministry of Labour | Employment Services | How to register for job placement? | Visit nearest employment exchange office.

doc_id: ministry_public::nic::How to change my NIC details?
title: How to change my NIC details?
content: Ministry of Public Administration | NIC Services | How to change my NIC details? | Submit application with supporting documents to Registrar of Persons office.

doc_id: ministry_public::public_general::What services are offered?
title: What services are offered?
content: Ministry of Public Administration | General Services | What services are offered? | Please check the service list on the portal.

metadata.instructions: Use contact details to get more info.

doc_id: ministry_justice::legal::How to get legal aid?
title: How to get legal aid?
content: Ministry of Justice | Legal Services | How to get legal aid? | Contact Legal Aid Commission.

doc_id: ministry_housing::housing_schemes::How to apply for government housing?
title: How to apply for government housing?
content: Ministry of Housing | Housing Schemes | How to apply for government housing? | Fill application at housing ministry office.

doc_id: ministry_housing::housing_schemes::How to apply for a building permit?
title: How to apply for a building permit?
content: Ministry of Housing | Housing Schemes | How to apply for a building permit? | Submit building plans to local authority with application form.

doc_id: ministry_agri::farming::How to get farming subsidies?
title: How to get farming subsidies?
content: Ministry of Agriculture | Farming Support | How to get farming subsidies? | Register with Agrarian Service Center.

doc_id: ministry_youth::youth_programs::What youth programs are available?
title: What youth programs are available?
content: Ministry of Youth Affairs | Youth Programs | What youth programs are available? | Check youth ministry website for current programs.

doc_id: ministry_youth::youth_programs::What training courses are available in digital skills?
title: What training courses are available in digital skills?
content: Ministry of Youth Affairs | Youth Programs | What training courses are available in digital skills? | Free digital skills courses available through ICTA and youth ministry programs.

doc_id: ministry_defence::defence_general::What services are offered?
title: What services are offered?
content: Ministry of Defence | General Services | What services are offered? | Please check the service list on the portal.

metadata.instructions: Use contact details to get more info.

doc_id: ministry_tourism::tourism_info::How to get tourist guide license?
title: How to get tourist guide license?
content: Ministry of Tourism | Tourism Information | How to get tourist guide license? | Apply through tourism ministry website.

doc_id: ministry_trade::business_reg::How to register a business?
title: How to register a business?
content: Ministry of Industry & Trade | Business Registration | How to register a business? | Register online through ROC website.

metadata.instructions: Prepare business plan and required documents.

doc_id: ministry_energy::electricity::How to get new electricity connection?
title: How to get new electricity connection?
content: Ministry of Power & Energy | Electricity Services | How to get new electricity connection? | Apply through CEB office.

doc_id: ministry_water::water_supply::How can I get water connection?
title: How can I get water connection?
content: Ministry of Water Supply | Water Connection | How can I get water connection? | Apply at NWSDB office.

doc_id: ministry_env::env_permits::How to get environmental clearance?
title: How to get environmental clearance?
content: Ministry of Environment | Environmental Permits | How to get environmental clearance? | Submit project proposal to CEA.

doc_id: ministry_culture::cultural_events::What cultural events are available?
title: What cultural events are available?
content: Ministry of Culture | Cultural Events | What cultural events are available? | Check ministry website for event calendar.

doc_id: ministry_road_safety::road_safety::Where to report a road safety complaint?
title: Where to report a road safety complaint?
content: Road Safety Authority | Road Safety Complaints | Where to report a road safety complaint? | Report to nearest police station or call 119.

metadata.instructions: Note the location and time of incident.
